author: kgilmer
msg: httplite: put 'shutdown server on last client deregistration' optimization in a thread and wait 30 seconds before checking if no clients are registered.  Fixes issue in which sole client "bounces" registration service on start and causes deadlock in server.

author: kgilmer
msg: httplite: fix resource path creation.  Remove redundant path separator char.

author: dkulp
msg: Getting closer to getting warnings resolved

author: dkulp
msg: JAX-WS Spec jars use plan List<Handler> which raises rawType warnings.  All we can do is suppress them in this case.

author: kgilmer
msg: httplite: add license header to test class.
